Just so you know, if this offer isn’t the right fit, I have another buyer lined up who will pay $8000. I believe the value you receive from this product justifies the premium price. Let me know if you’d like to move forward! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
